story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Now, now, Mr. President... What was that
all about?
story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Oho... Quite the frightening expression you’ve
got there. Don’t you think that’s a rather
unattractive look?
story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_0300_10:
That was a very selfish move on your part, as my
business partner.
story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_0500_10: I realized your methods weren’t enough.
story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’m sorry, but I’ve changed plans.
story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_0800_10: Weren’t we both planning on using each other...
story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_1100_10:
That’s fine. Thanks to all the commotion you
caused, it was easy for me to move about for
a while.
story_galar_02_16000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I hope you look forward to what’s about to
happen.
